alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 08 at 3:31PM CST until March 08 at 4:15PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northwestern Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 415 PM CST. * At 330 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Paint Creek, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Irby around 345 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 183 Near The Throckmorton- Baylor County Line and The Intersection Of Us-380 And Highway 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
